price: ហើយពួកគេបានដេកក្នុងរូងភ្នំរបស់ពួកគេអស់រយៈពេល បីរយឆ្នាំ និងថែមប្រាំបួនឆ្នាំ(៣០៩ឆ្នាំ)។
arabic: وَلَبِثُواْ فِي كَهۡفِهِمۡ ثَلَٰثَ مِاْئَةٖ سِنِينَ وَٱزۡدَادُواْ تِسۡعٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walabithū fī kahfihim thalātha mi-atin sinīna wa-iz'dādū tis'ʿan
